snippet: Prabal Gurung's first prefall collection was consistent with the designer's aesthetic: pretty with an edge.
abstract: Prabal Gurung's first prefall collection was consistent with the designer's aesthetic: pretty with an edge.
lead_paragraph: Prabal Gurung's first prefall collection was consistent with the designer's aesthetic: pretty with an edge. The silhouettes ranged from classic sheaths (in emerald green) to prim pleated skirts and fish-tail shirtdresses (with contrast colors on front and back). But what makes Gurung the next generation's red carpet go-to for the avant-garde (Rooney Mara, Jessica Chastain) is his ability to imprint himself on traditional fabrics and textures.
